angle of view: Nikon film SLR and FX-format D-SLR cameras: 75° Nikon DX-format D-SLR cameras: 53° IX240 system cameras: 63°
dimensions: Approx. 73 mm maximum diameter x 80.5 mm (distance from camera lens mount flange)
focusing: Rear Focusing (RF) System with autofocus controlled by Silent Wave Motor and separate focus ring for manual focus
lens construction: 11 elements in 9 groups (including 2 aspherical lens elements, and lens elements with Nano-Crystal coatings)
